name: satisfy
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: satisfy
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to please someone by giving them what they want or need

example.eg: They have 31 flavours of ice cream - enough to satisfy everyone!
example.egtrans: 他们有31种口味的冰激凌——足以让所有人都满意！

example.eg: Come on, satisfy my curiosity (= tell me what I want to know) - what happened last night?
example.egtrans: 来，满足一下我的好奇心，昨天晚上发生了什么事？

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to have or provide something that is needed or wanted
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: 达到条件／满足需要／符合要求

example.eg: She satisfies all the requirements for the job.
example.egtrans: 她符合这项工作的所有要求。

example.eg: There are three main conditions you must satisfy in order to become a member of the club.
example.egtrans: 要想成为俱乐部成员，必须符合3个主要条件。

dsense.name: satisfy
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to make someone believe that something is true

example.eg: I satisfied myself (that) I had locked the door.
example.egtrans: 我确信自己已经锁门了。

example.eg: The authorities were satisfied of (= they accepted) the seriousness of his situation.
example.egtrans: 当局相信他的处境很危急。
